author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- optimize lookup for case where no process name is passed to lookup a data product and only one data product will ever match that request.
- added more unit tests to test lookup for different conditions.
#### PR validation:

Code compiles. All framework unit tests pass.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1527
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1528
title: Optimize 'no process' data product lookup
